title: Luis Ubiña
text:
Luis Ignacio Ubiña Olivera (7 June 1940 – 17 July 2013) was an <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender, who played for the <a href="Uruguay%20national%20football%20team">Uruguay national team</a> between 1965 and 1973. He was part of the Uruguay squad for the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966</a> and <a href="1970%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1970</a> world cups.
At clubs level, Ubiña played for <a href="Rampla%20Juniors">Rampla Juniors</a> and <a href="Club%20Nacional%20de%20Football">Nacional</a>
